Header.title: AFRICA INTERNATIONAL HUMAN RIGHTS FILM FESTIVAL...
Header.paragraph: A team of journalist looking to empower humanr rights across all phases of life

About.paragraph: The Africa International Human Rights Film Festival is a three-day festival that will spotlight the best of African films, fiction, and short productions on Human rights. Ranging from human rights abuses to gender-based/domestic violence, to human/child trafficking, to child molestation and abuse, to police brutality, to  corruption and abuse of power by public office holders, AIHRFF seeks to highlight existing abuses and reinvigorate hope in people and the respect for human rights. This event will drive human rights campaign home through films and empower Africans, wherever they may be, to support human rights and expose/speak out against abuses.
Highlights: Panel Discussions on Police Brutality and Justice Reforms in Nigeria (Africa)
Roundtable sessions on Child abuse, human trafficking, gender/sexual-based violence
Highlights2: Panel session on Human Rights and Gender Rights in Africa
Panel Session on Civic Engagement: Political Education, Political Parties and Electoral Process in Nigeria.

Partners.name: You can support financially
Partners.text: Your Financial support is greatly needed and would surely go a long way to helping us give you the best film festival ever. Thanks.

Partners.name: You can support with logistics
Partners.text: Helping us with logistics would go a long way to help us deliver a great, like never before festival. We would love to hear from you.

Partners.name: You can support In any way you wish
Partners.text: As we aim at organizing an interntional standard festival, we welcome designers, and partners who would like to support us with equipments to get in touch with us.
